events.name: Zelensky praises British assistance
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky praised British leadership and assistance during talks with British Defense Secretary Ben Wallace in Kyiv.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky praised British leadership and assistance during talks with British Defense Secretary Ben Wallace in Kyiv.

events.name: Zelensky's gratitude
events.wd_description: Zelensky expressed gratitude to Great Britain, its government, and the prime minister, emphasizing that the war highlights who Ukraine's real friends are.
events.description: Zelensky expressed gratitude to Great Britain, its government, and the prime minister, emphasizing that the war highlights who Ukraine's real friends are.

events.name: British leadership
events.wd_description: Zelensky noted that Great Britain constantly demonstrates its leadership in providing arms, money, and sanctions against Russia.
events.description: Zelensky noted that Great Britain constantly demonstrates its leadership in providing arms, money, and sanctions against Russia.

events.name: Wallace's visit
events.wd_description: Wallace's visit to Kyiv came a day after two Britons and a Moroccan were sentenced to death by a court in the self-proclaimed Donetsk People’s Republic.
events.description: Wallace's visit to Kyiv came a day after two Britons and a Moroccan were sentenced to death by a court in the self-proclaimed Donetsk People’s Republic.

events.name: Flood traps miners in Canadian-owned mine
events.wd_label: Flood traps miners in Canadian-owned mine
events.wd_description: A flood from torrential rainfall caused miners to be trapped in a Canadian-owned mine, prompting a 24-hour rescue effort with specialized equipment from Ghana and South Africa.
events.description: A flood from torrential rainfall caused miners to be trapped in a Canadian-owned mine, prompting a 24-hour rescue effort with specialized equipment from Ghana and South Africa.

events.name: Rescue efforts
events.wd_description: The rescue effort has been ongoing 24-hours a day, utilizing specialized equipment to pump millions of liters of water out of the mine.
events.description: The rescue effort has been ongoing 24-hours a day, utilizing specialized equipment to pump millions of liters of water out of the mine.

events.name: Search in first refuge chamber
events.wd_description: After 4 weeks, rescuers reached the first refuge chamber at 560 meters from the surface, but no miners were found.
events.description: After 4 weeks, rescuers reached the first refuge chamber at 560 meters from the surface, but no miners were found.

events.name: Search in second refuge chamber
events.wd_description: Efforts are now directed towards reaching the second refuge chamber at 710 meters from the surface, despite difficult working conditions.
events.description: Efforts are now directed towards reaching the second refuge chamber at 710 meters from the surface, despite difficult working conditions.

events.name: Miners' families
events.wd_description: The miners' wives have gathered near the area, holding prayer congregations with hopes of their husbands being found alive.
events.description: The miners' wives have gathered near the area, holding prayer congregations with hopes of their husbands being found alive.

events.name: North Korea fires eight short-range ballistic missiles
events.wd_label: North Korea fires eight short-range ballistic missiles
events.wd_description: North Korea launched eight short-range ballistic missiles into the waters off its east coast, an unprecedented move according to the South Korean Joint Chiefs of Staff.
events.description: North Korea launched eight short-range ballistic missiles into the waters off its east coast, an unprecedented move according to the South Korean Joint Chiefs of Staff.

events.name: Missile launch details
events.wd_description: The missiles were launched from multiple sites between 9:08 a.m. and 9:43 a.m. Seoul local time, marking the third missile test since the new South Korean president took office.
events.description: The missiles were launched from multiple sites between 9:08 a.m. and 9:43 a.m. Seoul local time, marking the third missile test since the new South Korean president took office.

events.name: Japanese response
events.wd_description: Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida protested the launch, citing it as a violation of UN resolutions.
events.description: Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida protested the launch, citing it as a violation of UN resolutions.

events.name: Missile specifications
events.wd_description: Japan's Defense Ministry reported that six of the missiles reached a maximum altitude of 50 to 100 kilometers and traveled a distance of 300 to 400 kilometers.
events.description: Japan's Defense Ministry reported that six of the missiles reached a maximum altitude of 50 to 100 kilometers and traveled a distance of 300 to 400 kilometers.

events.name: Defense response
events.wd_description: South Korean Joint Chiefs of Staff Chairman Won In-Choul and Commander of the ROK-US Combined Forces Command Paul LaCamera held a virtual meeting to reaffirm their defense capability to detect and intercept North Korean missiles.
events.description: South Korean Joint Chiefs of Staff Chairman Won In-Choul and Commander of the ROK-US Combined Forces Command Paul LaCamera held a virtual meeting to reaffirm their defense capability to detect and intercept North Korean missiles.

events.name: GM Cobalt Sourcing Agreement
events.wd_description: GM has signed a multi-year sourcing agreement for cobalt supply from Glencore’s mining operation in Australia to support its EV battery production.
events.description: GM has signed a multi-year sourcing agreement for cobalt supply from Glencore’s mining operation in Australia to support its EV battery production.

events.name: Cobalt Supply Agreement
events.wd_description: GM signed a multi-year sourcing agreement with Glencore for cobalt from their mining operation in Australia.
events.description: GM signed a multi-year sourcing agreement with Glencore for cobalt from their mining operation in Australia.

events.name: Use in Ultium Batteries
events.wd_description: The cobalt sourced from Australia will be used in GM’s Ultium battery cathodes for models like the Chevrolet Silverado EV, GMC Hummer EV, and Cadillac LYRIQ.
events.description: The cobalt sourced from Australia will be used in GM’s Ultium battery cathodes for models like the Chevrolet Silverado EV, GMC Hummer EV, and Cadillac LYRIQ.

events.name: Responsible Sourcing Initiative
events.wd_description: Both GM and Glencore are members of the Responsible Minerals Initiative, focusing on secure and sustainable sourcing of critical raw materials.
events.description: Both GM and Glencore are members of the Responsible Minerals Initiative, focusing on secure and sustainable sourcing of critical raw materials.
